lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Jan. 1 (AP) -- Tension noticeably increased in official circles tonight as the government awaited, amid rumors of ruptured negotiations, Reichsfuehrer Adolf Hitler's reply to the proposals of Marshal Petain for limited French-German collaboration.
abstract: tension rises as Vichy awaits Hitler's reply to Petain's limited collaboration proposal
